definition: gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)

sentences.english: We young Mormon men enter the Aaronic priesthood when we're twelve.
sentences.chinese: 我們年輕的摩門男子在十二歲時就是次級傳教士了。

sentences.english: Mormons administer the sacrament of the Lord's Supper as a memorial of Christ's death.
sentences.chinese: 摩門教徒將聖餐之禮看作對基督之死的紀念。

sentences.english: The nickname is from the MormonChurchChurch's symbol for hard work.
sentences.chinese: 這一別名來摩門教會對於辛勞工作的象徵。

sentences.english: The Utah branch of Mormonism dissolves the distinctions between the priesthood and the laity.
sentences.chinese: 摩門教猶他會解除了祭司與世俗者之間的區別。

sentences.english: In the Book of Mormon there are many Anti- Christs.
sentences.chinese: 在摩門經中有很多反基督者。

sentences.english: Yet many Americans have doubts about Mormonism.
sentences.chinese: 然而許多美國人對摩門教有所懷疑。

sentences.english: Crew necks are for squares and Mormons.
sentences.chinese: 圓領衫是給“飛機場”和摩門教徒穿的。

sentences.english: We can not order you to read the Book of Mormon.
sentences.chinese: 我們不能命令你讀摩門經。

sentences.english: Others, however, laughed at some of the beliefs of the Mormons.
sentences.chinese: 然而，也有些人嘲笑摩門教的信仰。

sentences.english: The two young Mormons stared at him in amazement.
sentences.chinese: 這兩個摩門年輕人開始很喫驚地瞪着他。

sentences.english: Trust me, he's Mormon, those guys never wank.
sentences.chinese: 相信我，他是個摩門教徒，他們不會擼的。

sentences.english: This insert connects the record engraved on the Small Plates with Mormon's abridgment of the Large Plates.
sentences.chinese: 這插入連接的記錄刻在小板的摩門教徒的刪節大板。

sentences.english: Mormons are a religious group founded in USA in 1830.
sentences.chinese: 摩門教派是1830年在美國成立的一個宗教團體。

sentences.english: While this might not necessarily be madness, it was about the Mormons.
sentences.chinese: 也許這不一定是瘋狂，它說的是摩門教徒。

sentences.english: Some voters are put off by Mr Romney’s Mormonism.
sentences.chinese: 一些投票人因爲羅姆尼是摩門教而放棄投票。

sentences.english: As a Mormon, my one illicit curiosity had always been sex.
sentences.chinese: 作爲一個摩門教徒，我違規的好奇心總是圍繞着性。
